answers.answer: Best to ask your doctor as there a number of insulin sliding scale dosages available, each varying from the other. Your doctor can provide you with a scale which best represents your medical history and needs. And, the scale variation also is dependent on the type of insulin used – rapid acting, short acting, intermediate acting, long acting, or pre-mixed.

question: where my i get a printable sliding scale chart for my inslin useage
title: diabetes
